|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7130;AR7130-AC1E, P13787.005C, 0715, CHINA; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 300 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;25P32V6P; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS8M16FS-5T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996FC; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:6B |oui = 00:11:6B

|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5511;;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/05/2007 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5416;AR5416-AC1A, GT5191.1B, 0720, TAIWAN; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR2133;AR2133-AL1A, GM7992.1C, 0721, KOREA; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "YGB00A-1.6MM" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
"YGB10A-1.6MM" and a date code of '''0722''' (June 2007) is silkscreened on one particular production model unit's board. :This particular board is using all '''nichicon''' radial capacitors.
The device is on [http://download.level1.com/level1/member/marketingdocument/Broadband_and_ADSL_Router_Comparison_Table.xls this list].
The FCC ID printed on the label is P27-IP1006AA ([https://svn.dd-wrt.com/ticket/321 on DD-WRT Trac]). The FCC ID in reality is P27IP1006AA.. which redirects to K7SF5D8231-4D.
The default SSID may be '''default'''.
The power adapter included with the device is a '''unbranded''' RHN-120100-1-1 (12V, 1A).
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.xbitlabs.com/articles/networking/display/levelone-wbr6000_3.html Reviewed on '''Xbitlabs'''] (dated 12/16/2008) "YGB10A-1.6MM" and a date code of '''0744''' (Nov. 2007) is silkscreened on the board shown. *[http://www.gargoyle-router.com/phpbb/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=934 On the '''Gargoyle''' forum]
